title: Uruk-hai Armory (1C157)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While you can spot an Uruk-hai, the fellowship archery total is -1.
Lore:	The ranks of Saruman's army include forgers of weapons and armour.
Rarity:	C
